member.name: T:WebApiServices.Controllers.EmployeeController
member.summary: An example API Controller exposing CRUD functionality for sample employee data.

member.name: M:WebApiServices.Controllers.EmployeeController.GetByName(System.String)
member.param: Text to search for within last name.

member.name: M:WebApiServices.Controllers.EmployeeController.GetOne(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieve an employee by employee ID.

member.name: M:WebApiServices.Controllers.EmployeeController.Post(WebApiServices.Models.Employee)
member.returns: Returns an HttpResponseMessage indicating the status of the operation and, on success, containing a URL that can be used to retrieve the Employee object.

member.name: M:WebApiServices.Controllers.EmployeeController.Put(WebApiServices.Models.Employee)
member.returns: Returns an HttpResponseMessage indicating the status of the operation.

member.name: M:WebApiServices.Controllers.EmployeeController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.param: Employee ID of employee to delete.
member.returns: Returns an HttpResponseMessage indicating the status of the operation.

member.name: T:WebApiServices.Controllers.PersonController
member.summary: An example API Controller exposing CRUD functionality for sample Person data.

member.name: M:WebApiServices.Controllers.PersonController.GetReset
member.summary: Reset the data to a known state.

member.name: M:WebApiServices.Controllers.PersonController.Post(WebApiServices.Models.Person)
member.returns: Returns an HttpResponseMessage indicating the status of the operation and, on success, containing a URL that can be used to retrieve the Person object.

member.name: M:WebApiServices.Controllers.PersonController.Put(WebApiServices.Models.Person)
member.returns: Returns an HttpResponseMessage indicating the status of the operation.

member.name: M:WebApiServices.Controllers.PersonController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.param: ID of the person to be deleted.
member.returns: Returns an HttpResponseMessage indicating the status of the operation.

member.name: T:WebApiServices.Filters.ValidateModelAttribute
member.summary: This filter runs requests through ModelState validation and, if validation fails, returns an error response without even calling the operation.
